EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: This is your Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a path to follow between Heart, Sky and Thorn.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You follow the path of the Heart. The rest of this tree's options will be determined by this choice.
You gain the Magical Training feat.
Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to all DCs +5 Fire, Light, Positive and Universal Spell Power +50 Maximum Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You follow the path of the Sky. The rest of this tree's options will be determined by this choice.
You gain the Magical Training feat.
Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to all DCs +5 Electric, Cold, Sonic and Universal Spell Power +50 Maximum Spell Points

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You follow the path of the Thorn. The rest of this tree's options will be determined by this choice.
You gain the Magical Training feat.
Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to all DCs +5 Acid, Force, Poison and Universal Spell Power +50 Maximum Spell Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Now Grow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a second path to follow beyond your first.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain a minor affinity for Heart. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one:
+3 Fire, Light, and Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain a minor affinity for Sky. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one:
+3 Electric, Cold, and Sonic Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description:
You gain a minor affinity for Thorn. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one:
+3 Acid, Force, and Poison Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Weathering the Elements
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +15% Absorption versus Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison damage. Whenever you cast any Protection From Energy spell, it grants you 25 points per level instead of 12 with no level cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Regrowth
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Resting grants you Nature's Resurgence. In addition, once per rest, if you drop below 5% of your maximum spell points, you immediately gain Nature's Resurgence and 500 Spell Points.
Nature's Resurgence: +5% Spell Critical Damage. This lasts until your next rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Seeking Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Reflex Saving Throws, +[2/4/6] Tumble and Balance. Rank 3: If you are using a Quarterstaff, you gain +1 Damage and +5 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Well Weathered
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Spell Selection I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Epic Strike.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Carrion Swarm
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Target enemies and all enemies within a small radius around them become covered with biting acidic and poisonous insects. Every 2 seconds they take 1d6+1 Acid and 1d6+1 Poison damage per every 2 Character Levels for 8 seconds (Max Caster Level 20). Stacks up to 3 times. Each stack also causes a -4 penalty to attack rolls and Armor class. Every few seconds, affected enemies have a chance to break free of the swarm if they pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC: 20 + highest of Int/Wis/Cha modifier mod + Conjuration bonuses). Cost: 2 Spell Points Cooldown: 6 seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.
Requires you to be attuned to the path of Thorn.
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spring to Summer
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: A burst of butterflies forms around the caster in a small radius applying a copy of rejuvenation cocoon to all allies. After several seconds the butterflies burst into flame causing 1d6+6 Fire Damage per Character Level (up to a Max caster Level of 20) to all nearby enemies. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex save (DC: 20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA mod + Evocation bonuses). Cost 20 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.
Requires you to be attuned to the path of Heart.
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Storm Catcher
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Target enemy is instantly struck by a bolt of lightning for 1d8+8 Electric damage per Caster Level. Target also becomes chilled to the bone for 8 seconds slowing their movement and reducing their Reflex save by half your Character Level (Max caster level 20). They also taking 1d6 Cold damage per Caster Level every two seconds for the duration. Cost: 2 Spell Points Cooldown: 8 seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.
Requires you to be attuned to the path of Sky.
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Friend
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you sit to rest at a Rest Shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bat of Echoes
EnhancementSelection.Description:
When you sit to rest at a Rest Shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.
+10 Sonic Spell Power, +15% Sonic Absorption, +3 Listen

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bird of Wind
EnhancementSelection.Description:
When you sit to rest at a Rest Shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.
+10 Electric Spell Power, +1% Dodge, +3 Spot

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fox of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description:
When you sit to rest at a Rest Shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.
+10 Fire Spell Power, +2 Damage with Sneak Attacks, +3 Move Silently

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frog of the Lake
EnhancementSelection.Description:
When you sit to rest at a Rest Shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.
+10 Cold Spell Power, +2 Magical Resistance Rating, +3 Jump

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spider of the Deeps
EnhancementSelection.Description:
When you sit to rest at a Rest Shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.
+10 Poison and Acid Spell Power, 15% Poison Absorption

EnhancementSelection.Name: Squirrel of Luck
EnhancementSelection.Description:
When you sit to rest at a Rest Shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.
+1 to Attack, Damage, and all Saving Throws

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Rejuvenation Cocoon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protects your target with a shield of 150 Temporary Hit Points for 9 seconds. Heals 5d6 HP every 2 seconds while the shield persists. Cost: 12 Spell points Cooldown: 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Flowers in the Thorns
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stepping inside a Spike Growth or Entangle spell, whether hostile or friendly, heals you for 1d3 hit points every 5 seconds per Character Level of the spell's owner.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mantle of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle: Your Healing spells have a chance to apply a copy of Rejuvenation Cocoon to your target. Your Fire, Light, and Alignment spells have a chance to apply a blast of that damage type for an extra 1d6 per Character Level. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each effect can only occur once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any Melee or Ranged Attack can also generate one of these effects.

Stance.Name: Mantle of Nature
Stance.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Healing spells have a chance to apply a copy of Rejuvenation Cocoon to your target. Your Fire, Light, and Alignment spells have a chance to apply a blast of that damage type for an extra 1d6+6 per character level. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each effect can only occur once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle: Your Cold, Electric, and Sonic spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6 damage per Character Level of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any Melee or Ranged Attack can also generate one of these effects.

Stance.Name: Mantle of Nature
Stance.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Cold, Electric, and Sonic spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6+6 damage per character of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle: Your Acid, Force, and Poison spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6 damage per Character Level of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any Melee or Ranged Attack can also generate one of these effects.

Stance.Name: Mantle of Nature
Stance.Description: Mantle of Nature: Your Acid, Force, and Poison spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d6+6 damage per character of the same type as the spell used. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each element can only strike once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Any melee or ranged attack can also generate one of these effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Thrive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+50 Maximum Spell Points.
Your Epic strike in this tree now has a 30% chance to grant Thrive when cast.
Thrive: The cost of all spells is reduced by a 25% Enhancement bonus for 4 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Spell
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Primal spell.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reborn in Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description:
A swirl of fire surrounds you dealing 1d6 Fire damage per Character Level to enemies, who take half damage on a successful Reflex save (DC: 20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA mod + Evocation bonuses) and healing allies for 1d6 Hit Points per Character Level (Max Caster Level 20). Cost: 20 Spell Points Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.
Requires you to be attuned to the path of Heart.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shard Storm
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Summons a cloud of acidic poisonous shards that randomly strikes enemies within 15 meters. 6 strikes over 6 seconds. Each shard deals 1d4+2 Poison and 1d4+2 Acid damage per Character Level (Max Caster Level 20). Cost: 20 Spell Points Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.
Requires you to be attuned to the path of Thorn.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thunder Snow
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Sends forth a wide wave of freezing hail with a narrow blast of lightning at its center directly in front of the caster. The hail deals 1d6+4 Cold damage per Character Level to enemies it hits, who take half damage on a successful Fortitude save (DC: 20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA mod + Evocation bonuses). The bolt of lightning strikes for 1d6+4 Electric damage per Character Level (Max Caster Level 20) to enemies it hits, who take half damage on a successful Reflex save (same DC as above). Cost: 20 Spell Points Cooldown: 20
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.
Requires you to be attuned to the path of Sky.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spirit Boon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multi-selector

EnhancementSelection.Name: Body
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2] Primal bonus to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mind
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2] Primal bonus to Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Evergreen
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] Maximum Spell Points. Rank 3: When using your Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle, your spells have a chance to grant you 100 Temporary Spell Points for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Shared Mantle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While within your Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle you gain +3 bonus Imbue Dice. Your summons and hirelings now also benefit from your Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle, and they gain your current Spell Power Values.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to enhance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchantment
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Enchantment DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation DC

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation DC

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: At Its Core
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Upgrades your selected Primal Spell.
Heart: Doubles the damage of Reborn in Fire. Reborn in Fire now also grants +25% Uncapped Dodge for 4 seconds on use.
Sky: Doubles the damage of Thunder Snow. Thunder Snow now also applies the slow effect of Storm Catcher, slowing movement and reducing all targets' Reflex saves by half your Character Level for the duration of the slow.
Thorn: Doubles the damage of Shard Storm. Shard Storm now also grants you Shard Reflection for 12 seconds when used, giving you 25% of your Maximum Hit Points as Temporary Hit points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Shielding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +10 Maximum Hit Points and +2 Magical Resistance Rating. Your summons, pets, and hirelings gain a 60% bonus to Maximum Hitpoints, +30 Magical Resistance Rating, +4 Reflex Saving Throws, and gain the Evasion feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Evasion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain the Evasion Feat. Exclusive from other enhancements that grant this feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Reach
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Universal Spell Power. Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you [3/6/9] Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Blessing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
When you rest, a natural spirit manifests as a Unicorn and grants Nature's Blessing to yourself and nearby allies.
Nature's Blessing: +5% Insight bonus to Maximum Hit points. This effect lasts until you leave the dungeon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Improved Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Metamagic to improve.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Quicken Metamagic by [1/2/4] spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Improved Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Metamagic to improve.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Quicken Metamagic by [1/2/4] spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Ally
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain the ability to summon an elemental ally based on your nature.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart Flame Dryad
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Heart Flame Dryad: Creates an elder dryad that casts Fire, Light, and Healing spells (using you Fire, Light, and Positive Spell Powers respectively) and adding double the highest of your (INT/WIS/CHA) modifier to their casting DCs. She remains rooted to her summoning point. Cost: 50 Spell Points. Cooldown: 20 Seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky Storm Rager
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Sky Storm Rager: Creates a greater storm spirit to blast your foes with Lightning, Cold and Sound (using your Electric, Cold, and Sonic Spell Powers respectively) and adding double the highest of your (INT/WIS/CHA) modifier to their casting DCs. Remains bound to their summoning spot. Cost: 50 Spell Points. Cooldown: 20 Seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn Walker
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Thorn Walker: Creates a greater thorn spirit to blast your foes with Acid, Poison and Force (using your Acid, Poison, and Force Spell Powers respectively) and adding double the highest of your (INT/WIS/CHA) modifier to their casting DCs. Remains bound to their summoning spot. Cost: 50 Spell Points. Cooldown: 20 Seconds.
Is considered a Druid spell for interactions with other abilities.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Ancient Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mass Frog
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Up to six nearby enemies are turned into frogs. Each may avoid ribbiting on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs. DC (20 + Highest of INT/WIS/CHA modifier + Transmutation bonuses). Costs 60 Spell Points. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

DC.Name: Mass Frog
DC.Description: Up to six nearby enemies are turned into frogs. Each may avoid ribbiting on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs. DC (20 + Highest of Wis/Int/Cha modifier + Transmutation bonuses).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Greater Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a powerful form of Wild Shape. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Moment: Become like a Summer Fire for 20 seconds and gain:
25% Action Boost to movement speed Ethereality to enemies, allowing you to pass through them. 25% Uncapped Dodge Immunity to Fire damage, Light damage, and most Crowd Control effects. You deal 1d6 Fire damage per Character Level (Max caster Level 20) to enemies close to you and heal you and your allies with Positive energy for 1d6 Hit Points every 2 seconds. Cooldown: 5 minutes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky Rager
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Moment: Become like a raging storm for 20 seconds and gain:
25% Action Boost to movement speed Ethereality to enemies, allowing you to pass through them. Immunity to Cold damage, Electric damage, and most Crowd Control effects. You deal 1d6 Cold damage per Character Level to enemies close to you every 2 seconds, and slow those enemies. Random nearby enemies will be struck by Lightning for 1d6+6 Electric damage per Character Level (Max caster Level 20) and will be knocked down with no saving throw. Cooldown: 5 minutes

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn Cloud
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Moment: Become like a cloud of thorns for 20 seconds and gain:
25% Action Boost to movement speed Ethereality to enemies, allowing you to pass through them. 50% Incorporeality Immunity to Poison damage, Acid damage, and most Crowd Control effects. You deal 1d2 Acid and 1d3 Poison damage per Character Level (Max caster Level 20) to enemies close to you every 2 seconds.Nearby enemies also have a 50% chance to become confused for 6 seconds with no saving throw. knocked down with no saving throw. Cooldown: 5 minutes

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Improved Intensify Spell
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduces the cost of the Intensify Spell Metamagic by [2/4/6] Spell Points.
